items.name: Locale
lines: The locale for case insensitive search.

items.name: changedChars
lines: This many characters can be different (as a replacement) between the found word and the search pattern in a \"Weighted Levenshtein

items.name: deletedChars
lines: This many characters can be missing in the found word in a \"Weighted Levenshtein Distance\" search.

items.name: insertedChars
lines: This many characters can be additional in the found word in a \"Weighted Levenshtein Distance\" search.

items.name: replaceString
lines: The replacement text (is for optional replacing - SearchOption is only the data container for it)

items.name: searchString
lines: The text or pattern to be searched.

items.name: transliterateFlags
lines: Same meaning as the enum of com.sun.star.i18n.TransliterationModules
